subtitleNullable: Unveiling the Language of International Trade and Travel
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains a variety of country codes and other information for 251 countries and islands. The codes include ISO 3166 codes, ITU dialing codes, ISO 4217 currency codes, and more. The dataset also includes information on the country's status, name, language, and capital city. This dataset is a valuable resource for anyone who needs to lookup information about countries.


***The Comprehensive Country Codes dataset can be used for geocoding, data visualization, data analysis, machine learning, and research.***

**Here is a more detailed description of the dataset:**

**FIFA1stringCodes:** Codes assigned by the Fédération Internationale de Football Association
**Dial2stringCountry code:** Dialing code from ITU-T recommendation E.164, sometimes followed by area code
**ISO3166-1-Alpha-3:** 3-character alpha codes from ISO 3166-1 (synonymous with World Bank Codes)
**MARC4string:** Machine-Readable Cataloging codes from the Library of Congress
**is_independent:** 5-character country status, based on the CIA World Factbook
**ISO3166-1-numeric:** 6-character numeric codes from ISO 3166-1
**GAUL:** 7-character Global Administrative Unit Layers from the Food and Agriculture Organization
**FIPS:** 8-character codes from the U.S. standard FIPS PUB 10-4
**WMO:** 9-character country abbreviations by the World Meteorological Organization
**ISO3166-1-Alpha-2:** 2-character alpha codes from ISO 3166-1
**ITU:** 11-character codes assigned by the International Telecommunications Union
**IOC:** 12-character codes assigned by the International Olympics Committee
**DS:** 13-character distinguishing signs of vehicles in international traffic
**UNTERM Spanish Formal:** 14-character country's formal Spanish name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**Global Code:** 15-character country classification from United Nations Statistics Division
**Intermediate Region Code:** 16-character country classification from United Nations Statistics Division
**official_name_fr:** 17-character country or Area official French short name from UN Statistics Divsion
**UNTERM French Short:** 18-character country's short French name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**ISO4217-currency_name:** 19-character ISO 4217 currency name
**Developed / Developing Countries:** 20-character country classification from United Nations Statistics Division
**UNTERM Russian Formal:** 21-character country's formal Russian name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**UNTERM English Short:** 22-character country's short English name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**ISO4217-currency_alphabetic_code:** 23-character ISO 4217 currency alphabetic code
**Small Island Developing States (SIDS):** 24-character country classification from United Nations Statistics Division
**UNTERM Spanish Short:** 25-character country's short Spanish name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**ISO4217-currency_numeric_code:** 26-character ISO 4217 currency numeric code
**UNTERM Chinese Formal:** 27-character country's formal Chinese name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**UNTERM French Formal:** 28-character country's formal French name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**UNTERM Russian Short:** 29-character country's short Russian name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**M49:** 30-character numberUN Statistics M49 numeric codes (nearly synonymous with ISO 3166-1 numeric codes, which are based on UN M49. ISO 3166-1 does not include Channel Islands or Sark, for example)
**Sub-region Code:** 31-character country classification from United Nations Statistics Division
**Region Code:** 32-character country classification from United Nations Statistics Division
**official_name_ar:** 33-character country or Area official Arabic short name from UN Statistics Divsion
**ISO4217-currency_minor_unit:** 34-character ISO 4217 currency number of minor units
**UNTERM Arabic Formal:** 35-character country's formal Arabic name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**UNTERM Chinese Short:** 36-character country's short Chinese name from UN Protocol and Liaison Service
**Land Locked Developing Countries (LLDC):** 37-character country classification
title: The Ultimate Country Code Repository
subtitle: Unveiling the Language of International Trade and Travel
